DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) combination sertraline ( SRT ) effective SRT alone treat child adolescent anxiety disorder ( initial 8 week CBT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Sequencing CBT Child Anxiety : CBT Plus Sertraline Versus Switch Sertraline
DOC.detailed_description: This project propose conduct pilot study collect preliminary data 'personalized adaptive treatment ' approach child adolescent anxiety disorder . All youth patient two site study first receive CBT re-assessed mid-treatment ( 8 session ) . Patients show partial response response follow 8 session CBT randomize either switch SRT alone CBT augmentation SRT .
